rooms.description: Grand entrance with traditional Chettinad motifs, reception area adhering to Vastu principles.
Open living space featuring high ceilings, decorated with Chettinad-style arches and carved wood details.
Dining area adjacent to the living room, designed with intricate floor patterns typical of Chettinad architecture.
Functional kitchen space with traditional design elements and modern amenities.
Guest bedroom with an attached small bathroom for convenience, following Vastu principles of proper alignment.
Spacious master suite with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet; designed to face the east as per Vastu guidelines.
Open balcony adjoining the living room, providing a seamless connection to outdoors, ideal for relaxation.

openings.details: Wide entrance door with decorative metalwork and glass panels.
Large windows with traditional lattice work for natural light, ensuring proper ventilation.
Windows designed to maintain privacy while allowing daylight.
